message.body: Are we still on for yoga tomorrow at 7pm? I really need it!!!
I would love that!!! if all goes well... I'll be there
That would be awesome. That class is very crowded so if you confirm that you are coming I will make a mat for you beside me. ⚡
ok lovie. looking forward to it!!
Me too! I just went to a panel session at the coop about where their food comes from. Cara was a panelist. She is so cute. ❤
love to yoga with momma but baby needs to study Rolly
it's sooo much info
Oh no!!!
Yes it is. Do you have a strategy? I'm not studying that much bc I don't really know what I could learn at this point?
baby needs to focus focus focus
Yoga clears the mind!
one must be present to clear the mind
That's true sweet Kev!
momma has taught me an infinite amount already
would love love love that
You too!
I will review via phone with you if that helps. For real!
Call me! Between 4:30 and 6:30 or after 9 but after 9 momma might be in bed.
When you can teach something it means you know it.
Are you awake baby bear cub? I'm not leaving for work till 10:45 if you want to talk Rolly for a bit.
Your groan is so great on the phone. It's even more groany!
lol. it's a tidal wave at the moment
I love it! I'm your tonification point and you're my dispersion point.
You're missing quite a show. Chad Bong just biked in all sweaty in a little white tshirt.
